about_the_game:
Customize your Futariuum’s Gate experience with this additional content pack! Cut to the chase by unlocking CGs, or streamline your gameplay and not have to worry about money or battles.

Includes:

🔋 Cheat Codes:

- Money Magic: Max out Maya’s wallet.

- Gallery Unlocker: Unlock any and all CGs to get straight to the action.

- Battle Skipper: Cut through the game’s battles and get back to the story.

🔋 PDF Walkthrough: Figure out every secret, witness every event and unlock every CG with this written walkthrough, to be updated with each of the game’s content updates.

🔋 And more! As the game is updated, we will strive to make ongoing changes and additions to the Utility Pack as well.

💭 How to access the DLC:

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in this game are adults aged 18 or over and all scenes and encounters are entirely consensual. Sexual and nude content is present in both the “Daily Life” and “Demon Hunter” gameplay. Sexual content includes vaginal, oral and anal sex, and non-penetrative intercourse with humans and monster girls, as well as nude scenes without sexual intercourse as an element. The game's “Demon Hunter” card battle combat features cards with explicit nude and sexual content, including depictions of bondage.

Mature themes in the story include mental illness, social anxiety and abandonment. Frequent profanity is present in the script, as well as sexually explicit dialogue. Violence is present in the script and dangerous combat is described accurately.

short_description: Experience stunning hand-drawn erotic scenes, deep writing and thrilling battles in Futariuum’s Gate, a story-focused visual novel, engaging deck-building card battler and roguelike RPG! Follow Maya, a well-hung futanari demon hunter and total slacker as she brings balance to Earth!
